body.name: Curel Japanese Skin Care Foaming Daily Face Wash for Sensitive Skin, Hydrating Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin, pH-Balanced and Fragrance-Free, 5 Ounces (Step 2 of 2-Step Skincare)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 21 mins
features: DRY, SENSITIVE SKIN FACE WASH - pH balanced, fragrance free, and colorant free, this oil-free face wash offers mild acne care
FACE PURIFYING SKIN CARE CLEANSER - Curel's water-based blackhead face wash formula gently washes away impurities with a foaming cleanse
GENTLE FACE WASH - An ideal anti-aging face wash, protect dry, sensitive skin with advanced ceramide skin care that preserves the skin's natural hydration barrier
JAPANESE SKIN CARE - This gentle face wash is the second of two steps in the Japanese double cleansing process for dry, sensitive skin.
COMBINE TWO FACIAL CLEANSERS - For best results, pair this facial wash with Curel Makeup Cleansing Gel in your skincare routine
body.description: The second step of the tried and true Japanese double cleansing skincare routine, this Curel Japanese Skin Care moisturizing face wash foams as it purifies, leaving behind soft and supple skin. This foaming face wash purifies your pores for a deep clean and revitalized skin. With a rich lather and an advanced formula that helps protect the skin’s natural ceramides, this luxurious sensitive skin face wash is ideal for skin that needs a boost. The pH balanced, fragrance free, and colorant free daily face wash offers clean face care. It is particularly important for dry, sensitive skin to be cleansed thoroughly and yet gently to preserve skin's ceramide levels and maintain healthy feeling skin. This dry skin face wash helps prepare the skin to have a clean base for moisturizers. The simple face wash was designed specifically for dry, sensitive skin. As an acne face wash, it is the second step in Curel's Japanese Skin Care version of the Japanese ritual ''double cleansing'', which is a two-step cleansing process that uses two different types of cleansers, one after the other. This exfoliating face wash works as natural face wash for women, daily face wash, and a fragrance free face wash. For best results, start your skincare routine with the Curel Japanese Skin Care Makeup Cleansing Gel, and follow with this Foaming Face Wash. Satisfaction guarantee. Limitations may apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My favorite cleansing oil ever. I've tried so many. This has no scent. It is lightweight, but works with water so well. Gets off all makeup with zero residues. It leaves your skin just feeling so soft and balanced. If you're new to cleansing oils this is such a good choice, and even if you're not, you won't be disappointed. also impressed by the pump, it doesn't leak - which many do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite
reviews.reviewText: This product is worth every penny. It is amazing at removing makeup. You don’t need to be aggressive and rub at your face harshly. This does all the work for you. It is so smooth, it feels incredibly buttery and leaves your skin hydrated as well. It rinses off easily too and does not leave any film unlike other first cleanses(balms, oils, etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: It feels hydrating unlike other toners. Good for dry, sensitive skin, especially in winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with product. Easy to use,feels great. I am senior and this makes feel so clean and soft. Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have oily dehydrated skin so I really love essences in my skincare routine. Most of them are with hyaluronic acid (HA) and I was looking for one that is glycerin based.This essence is very hydrating, absorbs very quickly, doesn't leave sticky residue like the ones with HA. Has no scent. My skin gets sensitive in winter time and gets red easily. The product did not irritate my skin, no additional redness, it helped calm my skin.I will repurchase this product and am also interested in trying more products from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A gentle cleanser that does its job. I cut back on my facial routine. I use this and a great serum and my face has never felt and looked better. I love their spray lotion too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switched from Cetaphil to Curel and won't be going back
reviews.reviewText: Love this easy pump foaming face wash. I keep one in my shower and one in the medicine cabinet and a backup in case I run out of either. It's a great lightweight soap that gets the job done. It won't remove all my makeup but nor do I expect it to. However, after using micellar water, this face wash is the perfect next step.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product, bad quantity
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and have used Curel before, it's a great moisturizing cleanser for sensitive and oily skin (which I have). I recommend the sebum control from Curel which is also a foaming cleanser that works wonders for textured skin. This one is good, hydrating, and doesn't aggravate the skin/reduces redness and irritation. I recommend the product itself, however I was very upset with the quantity. I opened the bottle and the cleanser was only filled about halfway. Which ridiculous considering the amount you get and the cost you pay.
Me encanta este limpiador como primer paso de mi rutina, retira muy bien y el maquillaje y bloqueador

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very popular Japanese skin care brand for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry and sensitive skin so it’s a bit difficult for me to find the perfect oil cleanser that removes all the makeup but keeps my skin hydrated. Just for a reference, I used to use Bobbi Brown oil cleanser which was good but not perfect since I felt slight dryness on my skin.In my humble opinion, this is the best so far since it does remove everything even mascara (doesn’t leave dark smudge under eyes), yet it doesn’t dry out my skin at all. Also the price is very affordable considering it lasted 1.5 months for me even though I used generous amount each time.This isn’t scented so I guess that’s a plus for some people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lovely cleansing gel. It removes all traces of make up as a first cleanse. It's gentle but effective. I can even use it around my sensitive eyes. I suffer from allergies, dry eye and blepharitis so my eyes are abit of an issue for me but this works for me. Highly recommend and it's amazing value, a beautiful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have fairly sensitive skin but my eye area is particularly sensitive, I suffer with allergies and blepharitis, so even when cleansers say they're for sensitive skin or they're dermatologically tested, I can't always use them, but this cleanser is just fabulous, the pump is so easy to use and the cleanser is a dream, I love the creaminess of the foam and it does not cause any issues for me around my eyes or face. On one occasion I'd washed my face then had to answer the phone before I'd had time to apply my serums and moisturiser, normally my face would feel horrendous if this ever happened but not with this cleanser, it's not drying at all - just perfect.I did also buy the Curel Makeup Cleansing Gel, (equally as good) which I use before to remove any make up. Both are beautiful products and such good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to rinse off but pricey
reviews.reviewText: Cleansing effect is ok, easy to rinse off but it's a bit pricey.
